doc:
Richard Loo https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Richard_Loo 0 Richard Loo (October 1, 1903 – November 20, 1983) was a third generation Chinese-American film actor who was one of the most familiar Asian character actors in American films of the 1930s and 1940s. A prolific actor, he appeared in over 120 films between 1931 and 1982. Richard_Loo ( October_1_,_1903 – November_20_,_1983 ) was a_third_generation_Chinese-American_film_actor who was one of the_most_familiar_Asian_character_actors in American_films of the_1930s_and_1940s . A_prolific_actor , he appeared in over_120_films between 1931_and_1982 .
